name: Roast Beef Panini with Caramelized Shallots and Roquefort
author: TerryWilson
summary: Excellent with either the Dijon-style mustard or horseradish cream.
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons Dijon mustard, or to taste
1 pound thinly sliced deli roast beef
1 ½ tablespoons finely shredded horseradish root
1 pinch salt and white pepper to taste
directions: Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat
Stir in the sliced shallots; cook and stir until very tender and golden-brown, about 10 minutes
Season to taste with salt and black pepper
Preheat a panini press according to manufacturer's instructions
Spread the cut sides of the baguettes with Dijon mustard, then sprinkle evenly with Roquefort cheese
Divide the roast beef among the bottom pieces, then spread the shallots out over the roast beef
Cut each baguette into two or three pieces to fit your panini machine
Grill the sandwiches on the preheated press until the bread is golden and crisp, and the cheese has melted, about 4 minutes
While the sandwiches are cooking, beat the heavy cream to soft peaks in a metal bowl
Stir in the horseradish, and season with salt and white pepper to taste
When ready, cut each sandwich in half, and serve with horseradish cream
